author: ayobamimacaulay
title: P2P Currency Exchange with DEFI
description: Immigrants lose a lot of money converting underserviced currency to the USD and then converting to the currency they need  (NGN - USD - CAD)
solution: A stable coin powered fiat currency DEX that allows users exchange the currency they have for the currency they need in a P2P fashion
experience: Our team has built a non-blockchain powered p2p exchange solution (Pre-Launch) and is looking boost the solution by building on Cardano
